string.original: Edible tuber used in Cooking recipes.
Delicious fruit used in Cooking recipes.
So lifelike! Who could made a perfect replica? Explore to investigate!
Is anyone home? Expand to find out!
Where you craft all your food.
Where you craft all your magical spells and potions.
Adds new craftables for your workshop.
I wonder if it breathes fire?
A heroic Knight Frozen in time!
Expand here and give her a kiss to find out what happens?
A Woodsman's Axe that will make you chop wood at an incredible speed
A Hammer that will make you build at an incredible speed
This comes from chopping a Pine Tree.
Where might it lead? Expand to find out!
Explore here to find out what's inside!
Helps you gather wood and cut trees.
Processes basic materials for your kichen.
Adds yummy pasteries to your kitchen.
Lets you process animals for your kitchen.
Adds weapons and armor to your workshop.
Cereal grain used in Cooking recipes.
Special beans used in Cooking recipes.
Lets you craft art and decos.
Special feed that will make an animal mature instantly.
This comes from harvesting Magic Beans.
This comes from feeding a Peacock.
Chop trees in a single swing.
This comes from collectioning from a mine.
Visit The Duke to trade for this item
A Magic Wand will make you craft at an incredible speed
A Ruby Scepter will make you craft at an incredible speed
A Hand Drill will make you craft at an incredible speed
A Sprinkler will make your crops grow at an incredible speed
This comes from harvesting Chili Peppers.
Adds tapesteries and clothes to your studio.
Where you start a Mardi Gras Parade.
Allows you to store your goods.
Where you craft all your manufacturing needs.
A plot of land where you plant crops.
Allows you to trade items with neighbors.
Leafy vegetable used in Cooking recipes.
A Shanty produces 10 gold coins from taxes.
A Small Cottage produces 50 gold coins from taxes.
A Small Brick Home produces 100 gold coins from taxes.
A Large Residence produces 200 gold coins from taxes.
A Manor produces 500 gold coins from taxes.
This comes from chopping down an Oak Tree.
This comes from chopping down a Pine Tree.
This coming from chopping down a Willow Tree.
This comes from chopping down a Birch Tree.
Expand here and use this catapult to help protect your kingdom!
Wooden Wall to keep beasties out.
Rubble Wall to keep beasties out.
A Moat to protect the Castle.
Expand here for a cannon! Guaranteed to blow something to smithereens!!
Treasure Chest with a gem inside
I suppose this party is for those with a big nose.
The perfect place to raise the roof in your kingdom!
Turkey legs and mutton joints abound at the feast!
MMMM Smells good I wonder whats cooking?
Cattails can only be placed on water.
Lilypads can only be placed on water.
Use Coins to explore and expand yer Kingdom.
Collect more Coins from Castle Buildings, Shanty Houses or by selling items to explore more!
Click on a Gloomy Area to explore
Increasing your Kingdom's Happiness unlocks new Castle Buildings that raise your Castle Level. Then you can explore to find Wizard Alastair!
Yuck, I'm surrounded by flowers! Do you mind pulling some up for me?
Pull up three Fiery Sunset flowers.
Your Majesty has found an XP STAR! These special stars increase your LEVEL, shown in the blue XP METER above. Perform actions to earn more!
Thanks! I would have banished those Gloom Wolves myself if I hadn't lost my arrowhead. Have you seen it?
Giving Gifts to your Kingdom's residents also increases Happiness. Beloved rulers check back frequently to keep their people happy.
Click Sonja to give her arrowhead
You can catch some Fish in the nearby pond.
Click on any water to fish in it.
If you built a Bazaar, you could trade items with your neighbors!
Now that you've purchased the Bazaar, you'll need to build it.
Build a Kitchen so we can enjoy some home cooking'!
A happy kingdom needs a thriving economy. You can earn gold by building a Shanty House and collecting taxes from it.
The more Shanty Houses you have, the more taxes you can collect to fund your kingdom’s growth! Cha-Ching!
Buy a Shanty House from the Market, build it, and click to collect taxes
That Chicken looks a little hungry. Maybe you should feed it.
Animals provide food and experience, but only if you remember to feed them!
Feed Animals by clicking on them.
No farm would be complete without a Chicken!
As your Kingdom grows, you'll be able to care for different animals, like Cows and Sheep!
Animals and other items can be bought in the Market.
Growing and selling crops is another way to earn money! Lets start with grapes.
Crops like grapes can be sold for Coins, given as Gifts, or used to craft other useful items.
Click on the Empty Farm Plot to buy and plant 1 Grape crop
As your Kingdom grows, we will need more Crops. Buy 2 Empty Farm Plots from the Market so we can plant more.
Crops take some time to grow, but they're worth it!
Buy Empty Farm Plots from the Buildings section of the Market.
Crops that are grown near water will grow faster.
Irrigated Wheat always tastes better, don't you agree?
Move the Farm Plots near the pond and harvest your Wheat.
We should fortify this castle with some walls and towers!
This place is really starting to come together!
Purchase walls and a tower from your Great Hall
SWIPE your mouse over ITEMS to COLLECT them
Swipe your mouse over items to collect them
Mmm! Those are some tasty grapes.
Look at that loot! Point your mouse at items to collect them. You might need them later.
The actual task the player needs to do
Sell some fish to earn gold!
Banish 10 Beasties, buy 1 Weapons Rack from the Market and craft 10 weapons at the Blacksmith
Use coins to explore into the Gloom.
People will settle here if you can show the land is productive.
You are on your way to Ruler!
You can use these tools to Move and Rotate my target.
Move and Rotate the Archery Target
Click on Sonja to accept a Quest
You can use these tools to Move and Rotate my target.
Click the tool and then the target to Move or Rotate it.
You have collected enough blue XP STARS to gain a level! Each level unlocks new items in the MARKET and increases your ENERGY. Claim your new LEVEL now!
CLICK your AVATAR to LEVEL UP
Click your Avatar to level up!
Leveling up gives you Energy and unlocks new items in the Market.
Click your Avatar to level up
Mmm! Those are some tasty grapes.
Mmm! Those are some tasty grapes.
CLICK on SONJA to give her a GIFT.
Your Majesty, there can be little Happiness where Gloom Wolves lurk. Please banish any that you encounter!
Huzzah! With the Gloom Wolves gone, your Kingdom is happier. You are a valiant banisher of beasties!
Click on the Gloom Wolves to banish them.
Place the Shanty House foundation on the ground.
Place 3 Decorations to brighten up your castle!
Decorations can be purchased in the Market
CLICK the GROUND and DRAG to look around
Scrolling allows you to look around
Click the ground and drag to look around
This area became overgrown while it was under the Gloom. Can you help us reclaim it by clearin' Grass and placin' Wooden Fences?
Aye, that's better. We'll tame this wilderness yet!
Click on Grass and Brambles to clear em'.
A Lumber Camp will help ye gather Wood to build more buildings.
Gatherin' Buildings like this Lumber Camp collect resources while ye relax... or clear some brambles. Yer choice.
Buy 1 Lumber Camp from the Market and build it
When your Grapes are ready, click to harvest them.
Click on 2 Grapes to harvest them.
Place the Great Hall from Your Inventory
Castles are unlocked by happiness. Here, we were saving this one fer ye upon yer return.
Odin's beard! That's a mighty Great Hall. Ye can click on it to buy more Castle Buildings!
Find 1 Great Hall in your Inventory and build it.
Tax the Shanty House to collect Coins
Click Sonja's House to complete it.
CLICK Sonja's House to build it
Tax the Shanty House to collect Coins
Gather Rocks and Wood to complete Sonja's House.
Now you have enough resources to build.
Mine Rocks for Stone and chop Trees for Wood
George would really love a Woodsman's Axe
This Woodsman's Axe will make chopping trees a snap!
The blasted Gloom scared off all of our farm animals. Would ye purchase us some new ones?
Thank ye, Majesty! Farm animals produce resources that we can give as gifts or use in craftin'.
Animals can be purchased in the Market.
Find 1 Great Hall in your Inventory
I've given you your first Castle Building, the Great Hall! Find it in your Inventory and build it.
You have built a magnificent Great Hall, Majesty!
Find 1 Great Hall in your Inventory and build it
You are on your way to Ruler!
RC: A Realm for a King
A strong and vibrant realm will demand buildings.
You are on your way to Ruler!
Plant the acorn and tend the tree
This enchanted tree will only grow in the realm of a true Ruler.
You are on your way to Ruler!
Demonstrate your worthiness by performing liege quests for 4 subjects and they will swear fealty to you.
You are on your way to Ruler!
Prove to George that you are a worthy ruler.
Now that's a sturdy-lookin' House fit fer a miner.
Free 10 areas of Gloom and move George's House
I love these weapons, but the Beasties won't!
Free 10 Gloomy Areas and complete George's House
Those Rats don't know what him 'em!Now the Kingdom is cleaner and safer
Demonstrate worthiness and George will swear fealty.
I swear my fealty to ye.
Craft, trade, or ask neighbors for items
Ha! Those mangy Gloom Wolves are not so tough.
Banish Gloom Wolves wherever ye find 'em, yer Majesty
Banish Thieves and recover the family Pendant
The Pendant is recovered and the Thieves are runnin'!
Banish Thieves wherever you find them
Drive Goblins out of the forest
Very glad to see those Goblins turn tail
Banish Goblins wherever ye find em'
Craft 20 Wood Planks in the Workshop
In Preparation for the arrival of the Royal Mount, build a Royal Corral.
You are on your way to Ruler!
To feed the Royal Mount, gather 100 Oats
Buy 1 Royal Horse Tack from the Market
Gather the tack and supplies that a Royal Mount will require.
You are on your way to Ruler!
Request the gift of 1 Royal Mount from a friend
Activate the Royal Mount to show the kingdom his rearing display.
The Royal Mount must be of good bloodlines.
You are on your way to Ruler!
Help me get settled into my new House.
Clear 3 Flowers and buy 3 Decorations from the Market
Let's get to work making space and gathering resources.
That will show the Duke we can handle a little work!
CLEAR grass, CHOP trees, and MINE rocks
This place is starting to look like a kingdom!
Build 5 Shanty Houses and 2 Castle Buildings
I need to show the Duke that I can be responsible by caring for some Cows.
Now we have all the milk we could want!
As your kingdom grows, we'll need more Crops.
That's what I call putting down roots!
It's time to earn some Gold!
Don't spend it all in one place.
Sell 5 items and tax Sonja's House 5 times
Let's spend some of our new Gold!
We've made a good start on your Kingdom. Let's take a break and explore!
Explore 5 times, find 1 person in the Gloom, and banish 15 Gloom Wolves
I want to practice my ARCHERY skills. Could you get me some equipment?
Now I can practice archery anytime!
Buy an Archery Target from the Market
George and I would like to exchange some gifts.
Give 10 gifts to George and Sonja
Can you help me find a place for my date with George?
A handful of wet oats used to be enough on the march, but no longer.
Buy Wheat seeds; craft, trade, or ask neighbors for Hot Buns
The name's Tom. I've been searching the Gloom for a nice place to settle.
This looks like a good place to settle.
Castle components are in the Market
Aye, I may be willing to give this kingdom a goo.
This could be the nicest place I've ever lived. *sniff*
Get logs from trees and stone from rock piles
Thieves have stolen my Tabard and I want it back!
Very pleased, my Laird, to have my Tabard back and bash those thieves.
I need weapons and equipment to train new knights.
I can now make men out of these boys.
Get Swords by crafting, trading or asking neighbors.
These lads are ready to show their metal mettle *wink*.
Banish Beasties wherever you find them
A hardboiled egg was real luxury in my campaigning days.
Ooh! A Pot Pie is a feast in one dish.
Tend Chickens to get Eggs and craft Chicken Pot Pie in the Kitchen.
I developed a taste for spicy foods in me travels.
Ha, ha! These Sausages remind me of golden-haired girls and fine beer!
Craft, Trade, or ask neighbors for 10 Spicy Sausages.
A Helmet for a Pillow? Nae!
There will be more comforts for me noo.
I can rest my weary bones, thank yea forsooth.
Craft, trade, or ask neighbors for Cotton Cloth and Bedding
A little industry around here would make life easier for all.
This kingdom's as busy as a one-armed wallpaper hanger!
Purchase Gathering Buildings from the Market; harvest them to gain resources.
People will thrive here if you dilligently tend the animals.
You are on your way to Ruler!
You are on your way to Ruler!
RC: The Acts of a King
A strong and vibrant realm will demand a Ruler of action.
You are on your way to Ruler!
House it going? Get it? Haha... but seriously, can you give me a hand here?
Thanks for the help, Highness! Wanna come in and hang out? No? Okay.
Move Richard's House and buy 3 Decorations from the Market
For my next trick: fire juggling!
Gather 5 Wood and Craft, Trade, or ask a neighbor for 3 Candles
The forest will provide you with the resources we need to construct buildings. Gather wood and stone.
Take only what you need and the forest will always be with you.
Now you have enough resources to build.
Mine Rocks for Stone and chop Trees for Wood
Beastie Nearby! Do you want to harvest for {energy} energy?
Beastie Nearby! Do you want to feed for {energy_cost} energy?
Welcome home, your Majesty! I'm afraid a bit of GLOOM may be ravaging your land and scaring off your subjects... nothing you can't handle!
WIZARD ALASTAIR would know what to do about this GLOOM, but I can't find him! Maybe you'll have better luck.
You found SONJA's ARROWHEAD! She must be nearby...
If only we could find that WIZARD! It wouldn't hurt to find some loyal SUBJECTS to help rebuild, too!
A mighty strike! Those STARS give you EXPERIENCE (XP). Collect enough of those XP stars to LEVEL UP!
Huzzah! You have enough XP to LEVEL UP! When you LEVEL UP, you gain ENERGY to do more actions and unlock new items and abilities.
Oh no, not a GLOOM WOLF! Someone must save poor SONJA!
Look at that LOOT! You should COLLECT those items. You might need them later.
Marvelous, your Highness! The GLOOM WOLF dropped one of SONJA'S ARROWHEADS. I wager she'd be HAPPY to have it back.
She tried to open the MAGICAL KEEP? No one has been able to do that since your father disappeared. Are you going to try?
You can also get more QUESTS from me. Look for the QUEST icon on the LEFT.
Royal coin purse a little light? Collecting taxes from HOUSES in your KINGDOM will get you some COINS!
That's WIZARD ALASTAIR'S satchel! Oh, thank the stars, he must be nearby!
You opened the MAGIC KEEP!? You truly are the HERO we have been waiting for! You'll make a great RULER. I would like to join your KINGDOM and aid your ADVENTURE!
You will need a strong CASTLE to dispel the GLOOM. Let's build a GREAT HALL raise your CASTLE LEVEL and find ALASTAIR!
Richard, the jester, has gone missing. He entered the gloom in search of Sonja, and no one has seen him since. Can you find him?
QUESTS are special tasks people will give you from time to time. I'll give you one to start.
The list on the LEFT will display your current QUESTS. Click the ICONS to check a QUEST's requirements and your current progress.
This QUEST has two parts. First, let's collect some STONE from these rocks.
Now we can gather WOOD from a nearby TREE by clicking it.
Well played! You completed your first QUEST. Click the ICON for your reward.
That was fun right? Look for more quests from me and others. SONJA has one too.
SONJA has joined your KINGDOM and brought some HAPPINESS with her! HAPPIER KINGDOMS provide more rewards. Your HAPPINESS is shown on the lower LEFT.
Completing QUESTS for your SUBJECTS is another way to gain HAPPINESS and increase rewards. Exclamation marks (!) mean that QUESTS available.
Giving GIFTs to your KINGDOM's residents also increases HAPPINESS. Beloved Rulers check back frequently to keep their people HAPPY.
DECORATIONS make the people in your KINGDOM happy. More rewards for you! Huzzah!
Excellent work! Continue growing your KINGDOM by purchasing more land.

Zounds! I knew you could open your father's KEEP! Unfortunately, it looks like the KEEP is in need of REPAIR. I've just given you a QUEST to repair it. QUESTS are special tasks people will give you from time to time.
A magnificent Great Hall, your Majesty! Now you may name your KINGDOM!
Looks like you're running low on ENERGY. You have a few ITEMS in your INVENTORY that will restore ENERGY and allow you to continue building your KINGDOM.
Should you continue to run low on ENERGY, more ENERGY ITEMS may be purchased in the MARKET.
The more farm plots you have, the more CROPS your subjects can enjoy. Empty plots may be purchased from the BUILDING tab in the Market.
Crops planted near WATER grow faster because they're irrigated! Move your Empty FARM Plots near the POND and harvest some Wheat.
COINS allow you to buy items and buildings to keep your residents HAPPY and grow your KINGDOM. Collect TAXES from HOUSES to earn COINS.
Now you have enough COINS to start growing your KINGDOM!
Collect MATERIALS from this building and others like it to save ENERGY.
Your residents want GRAPES! You will need to PURCHASE an EMPTY FARM PLOT from the MARKET before you can get planting.
When you plant CROPS near WATER, they become irrigated and grow FASTER!
Huzzah! You've gained enough HAPPINESS to start building your CASTLE!
Now with your KEEP built, we can start to push back The GLOOM! But first you must collect enough COINS to EXPLORE.
Excellent, you have enough COINS. Let's EXPLORE!
That's WIZARD ALASTAIR'S satchel! Oh, thank the stars, he must be nearby! Check the SATCHEL for clues.
Thank you for FREEING me! Can you also HELP me SEARCH for my lost ARROWHEAD? It's around here somewhere.
Upon my word, another GLOOM WOLF! Can you BANISH it?
Use COINS and EXPLORE here to see who this is.
Your game state is out of sync with the server. Please refresh the page to continue. Error: {error}
Some improvements were just made. Refresh the game to see the latest!
You have pending actions. Leave Game?
You do not have enough energy. Would you like to buy some?
Not enough coins. Would you like to buy more coins?
Not enough crowns. Would you like to buy more crowns?
Congratulations, you've unlocked some new items in the market! Would you like to see them?
Looks like you'll need a master blacksmith to break this rock. You should invite a friend.
You don't have any gifts. Click on accept to visit the gifts request page for more gifts.
Are you sure you want to sell all the items for {amount} {currency,object,count}?
string.variation: Are you sure you want to sell all the items for {amount} {currency,plural}?
Are you sure you want to sell all the items for {amount} {currency,singular}?

string.original: Don't ask me again while I sell these items.
Do you need more Coins or Cash?
Show all items ready to be made now
Craft your little heart out to hit level 50 and become a master!
You are currently at the happiness cap! Build more Castle parts to raise your cap.
Build more Castle Pieces to raise your Castle Level!
You'll be able to customize this avatar later.
UNCERTAIN TIMES CALL FOR GREAT RULERS TO LEAD THEIR PEOPLE TO HAPPINESS
Add this item to your wish list
Sort items by time to craft
Mouseover items for help finding them!
This item has already been by another player.
To Explore here, collect more Coins!
Would you like to Explore to this land for
You can not Explore here yet!
You can only Explore in adjacent areas.
Click to see in the market!
Travel home and see this in the market!
Happiness provides a bonus to collection of COINS.
Increase your total Happiness Cap by Expanding!
Click to see who wants to give you a Message.
You can't claim your own reward!
Sorry, looks like all the rewards have been claimed!
Sorry, you need to play Castleville before trying to claim this reward!
You got a reward! Play Castleville now!
Sorry! These feed rewards have all been collected.
Select the friends that you would like to send the {GIFT_NAME} gift
Here is a {GIFT_NAME} for you in Treasure Isle. Could you help me by sending a gift back?
Select the friends you would like to send the {gift_name} to!
If you don't see a friend in the list, it is because you already sent him/her a gift today
Select friends to send this gift to.
Select a FREE gift to send your friends!
Thank your friends for the gifts they sent you! Select a FREE gift to send them back!
Welcome {friendName} to Treasure Isle by sending a FREE gift...
Select a treasure to give away to your friends
Please remember to accept each gift right away.
Do you have more pending gifts to accept?
You have exceeded your limit of {limit} gifts. Be sure to use your existing gifts soon, or you can't accept more gifts!
The gift you tried to accept was LIMITED EDITION and is no longer available. More limited edition items coming soon!
Let you prepare beer and wine.
Adds new craftables at your magic shop.
Adds new craftables at your magic shop.
Unlocks new craftables at your magic Shop.
Unlocks new craftables at your magic Shop.
Helps you gather wood and cut your trees.
Unlocks new craftables at your magic Shop.
Where you can start a tax event.
Is it haunted? Expand here to find out!
Who could live here? Explore and find out!
I wonder if your wish will come true? Explore and find out!
This comes from harvesting Magic Beans.
This comes from a Cooking recipe.
If your game does not load within 10 seconds, you may need to upgrade your version of Flash. Please do so by clicking {link_start}here{link_end}
Here are your friends who don't have Castleville yet. Invite whomever you want -it's free!
There's a new version of the game. Let us refresh your browser.
Become a Fan to get extra coins and exclusive offers!
Become a dedicated Game Builder! You're just {number} clicks away!
At {requiredXP} experience you will reach level {nextLevel}.
Your max happiness will increase to {nextUpdateMaxHappiness} at level {nextUpdateLevel}!
Are you sure you want to sell this object?
Are you sure you want to sell "{item,object,singular}" for {amount} {currency,object,count}?
string.variation: Are you sure you want to sell "{item,singular}" for {amount} {currency,plural}?
Are you sure you want to sell "{item,singular}" for {amount} {currency,singular}?

string.original: Castleville fans get the latest updates, special gifts, and more!
...it's the best way to make sure you get the best treasures!
Select friends to add them as neighbors
Hello! Please be my neighbor in {appName}
Hello friend! Come be my neighbor in ExampleVille, where you can make a game and have fun!
Click here! Head on over to ExampleVille!
